About Me

BIO

Hi, my name is Fidel Hurtado. I am a Full Stack Software Developer from Florida. I have practiced development for over four years and have two years of professional experience in a fortune 500 company that incorporates Agile Methodologies. As a Full Stack Developer, I have worked with enterprise APIs, deploying appications, fixing bugs, creating SQL stored procedures, and developing web applications. In my free time, I play board games, guitar, video games, and I absoultely love hiking.
